mapper.select: /* 특정 자격증 정보 조회 */ SELECT li.li_code ,li.lmc_code ,li.lmc_name ,li.lsc_code ,li.lsc_name ,li.li_name ,li.li_overview ,li_qualification ,li_reg_id ,li_reg_date FROM license_info AS li WHERE li.li_code = #{liCode};
/* 자격증 대분류별 중분류 목록 조회 */ SELECT ls.lsc_code ,ls.lmc_code ,ls.lmc_name ,ls.lsc_name ,ls.lsc_reg_id ,ls.lsc_reg_datetime FROM license_sub_category AS ls WHERE ls.lmc_code = #{lmcCode};
/*자격증 정보등록을 위한 대분류 조회*/ SELECT lmc.lmc_code ,lmc.lmc_name ,lmc.lmc_reg_id ,lmc.lmc_reg_datetime FROM license_main_category AS lmc
mapper.insert: /* 자격증 정보 등록 */ INSERT INTO license_info ( li_code ,lmc_code ,lmc_name ,lsc_code ,lsc_name ,li_name ,li_overview ,li_qualification ,li_reg_id ,li_reg_date) VALUES (sf_new_license_info_code(), #{lmcCode}, #{lmcName}, #{lscCode}, #{lscName}, #{liName},#{liOverview}, #{liQualification}, #{liRegId}, CURDATE());
mapper.select: /* 자격증 정보 등록을 위한 목록 조회*/ SELECT * FROM license_info AS li
